content.rendered:
The conversion charts below are for students who matriculated to the University Fall 2015 or later and would like to transfer a course to fulfill a specific LVGE general education requirement.

Prospective students who currently attend a California Community College (CCC) can also use these charts to determine which course(s) at a CCC will fulfill a specific LVGE general education requirement.

You can select courses based on CSU-GE or IGETC course patterns. If you have a question, you can contact the Transfer and Evaluation Center at (909) 448-4002.

Conversion Charts

  • CSU General Education to La Verne General Education conversion chart
  • IGETC to La Verne General Education conversion chart
